script: AddText "The concourse is clean, orderly, and unmistakably Federation—cargo lifts hum in regular intervals, and the UTFE emblem gleams from every customs checkpoint. Trade officials move with purpose between docks while contracted loaders work in modular sync to offload freighters. Digital kiosks track cargo flow with near-perfect precision. Occasional announcements remind crews to check their clearances before departure." marketFlavorTextColor

AddText "The concourse is compact but efficient, with UTFE banners displayed at regular intervals and modular containers lined in neat rows. Smaller freighters and licensed charters offload under the watch of quiet, organized inspection crews. Trade is subdued but consistent, and official signage reminds visitors that all docking windows are subject to review." marketFlavorTextColor

AddText "The concourse operates under reduced staffing, but the Federation banners still hang, flanked by automated inspection drones. Trade traffic is light, and the flow of cargo is carefully controlled through sealed lanes. Officials seem tense—every movement checked twice, every manifest verified aloud. A notice loop reminds visitors that temporary restrictions are in place 'for systemic integrity.'" marketFlavorTextColor

AddText "The concourse feels hollow, with flickering UTFE signage and half-manned checkpoints behind sealed barriers. Only a few ships dock—most under escort—and the offloading process is slow, tense, and watched by armed security. Clearance procedures have been replaced by spoken orders and ID scans at rifle-point. A repeating tone plays from damaged loudspeakers: 'Maintain corridor discipline. Your cooperation preserves stability.'" marketFlavorTextColor
